name: combined-project
description: Combined project using NodeJS, WebRTC, Websockets, React, Vite, and more.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix apps/my-gpt-diary" "npm run dev --prefix apps/trello-tutorial" "npm run dev --prefix apps/my-gpt-diary2" "npm run dev --prefix apps/noom-master" "npm run dev --prefix apps/soom-chat-main"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix apps/my-gpt-diary" "npm run build --prefix apps/trello-tutorial" "npm run build --prefix apps/my-gpt-diary2" "npm run build --prefix apps/noom-master" "npm run build --prefix apps/soom-chat-main"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix apps/my-gpt-diary" "npm run start --prefix apps/trello-tutorial" "npm run start --prefix apps/my-gpt-diary2" "npm run start --prefix apps/noom-master" "npm run start --prefix apps/soom-chat-main"
